high-speed train on the Can Tho Con
Dao route is back in operation at
this time, contributing to strengthening the connection of
Con Dao with the mainland and vice versa
serving  Travel demand has increased among
Con Dao residents and tourists, especially during the
peak tourist season when there is a station at
Ninh Kieu wharf to take
tourists away. Going to the island is
very convenient.  Main Express ship with a
capacity of 338 passengers equipped with
advanced technology from the British Rolls-Royce Group. The ship
has an average speed of 32
knots per hour. The train runs on the Can
Tho Con Dao route about 4 hours a month.
Three Milen Express ships depart from
Ninh Kieu wharf, Can Tho city, at 7:00 a.m. on
Tuesdays, Thursdays and Saturdays, and
vice versa depart from Con Dao passenger ship port
at 1:00 p.m. on Wednesdays,
Fridays and Sundays.  The train will increase
operating frequency depending on the actual needs of
tourists on March 16. The North-South expressway project

marks an important milestone in completing

Severe kidney disease is being discovered more and
more. The country now has millions of
people with various levels of kidney failure and about

before, with lifestyle and habits.  This is

increase in young people, recorded in
Ho Chi

more than 15 minutes of patients under 35 years old has in
common that these patients who come to the
hospital are in severe stage 3
or B or even stage 5 condition, which is not
only expensive for the family but also dangerous.  can be
costly for society, so we must
detect the disease early to have
hope of bringing the patient back to near
normal. One of the reasons why
many young people suffer from kidney disease is the
habit of self-medicating.
Functional food products of unknown origin,
the habit of eating salty foods, staying up late, and drinking
alcohol are also risk factors that
promote kidney disease that progresses silently in
young people and gets worse quickly. If not
detected early, doctors recommend  Advise people
to have regular health checks. In addition, they
need to maintain a healthy lifestyle and reduce
salt in their diet. Limit the use of
foods with high salt content and
processed foods from
the beginning of the year until now.
